pages.text: I've spent some time studying $(item)diamond$().$(br)I've noticed this particular gem feels more pristine than the others; its magical ability derives from $(thing)knowledge$() and $(thing)arcane$() origins. In terms of combat, diamond offers much $(thing)lighter weapons and tools$(), allowing you to swing faster than the other gems.

The armor seems to have a will of $(thing)self-preservation$() when a full set of it is worn, slowly reforming nics and scratches that result from use. It also seems to have peculiar $(thing)magic-conversion and focusing$() properties, strengthing my magic damage and allowing my blades to deal some magical damage.
